111.content:
Instead of traveling the world or going to see new places, you decide to stay back at your home town to do odd jobs and save up money for something bigger in life. One of the many jobs you heard is available is watching over other peoples houses, but more specifically, Ms. Luce's house.

Now, about her, she is a normal old lady, nothing wrong with her, but the reason why no one wants to watch her house is because she has a lot of cats, about 6. Not only that, but because sometimes people end up missing when taking care of her house. This does not scare you though, since it's probably an urban myth spread by a bunch of dumb kids. Also, she pays a lot of money for people to watch over her house, since of the previously mentioned unwillingness people have to watch the place.

You hastily take the job, and, after some talking to Ms. Luce about what times to feed the cats and what medication to give which one, you are alone in a house with 6 cats. This job should be easy enough, just make sure the furballs don't die and feed them, and everything should be alright.

You sit down on the sofa and turn on the tv, relaxing and not paying attention to the area around you. You then feel a weight on your lap, as you look there and see...

"Okay but be careful the other cats will try to harm you by any means." The cat said. "What's your name?" You asked. "Daisy. And you?" Daisy asked. "Y/n." You said. "Y/n have to eat you to protect you." You do what?

Comparing your size to the paw that's covering you, you are about 1 inch tall, which does not spell great news to you. Being one inches in a house full of cats, some who would not even hesitate to bite down on you, does not sound ideal.

Soon, the tabby stops pressing onto you with it's paw, and lifts it up. You lay there, not that injured, luckily, but out of breath. The tabby then leans down towards you, letting her get a good smell of you. She thinks you are...

You fear that the cat thinks you are food, and brace for another lick, but instead the cat nuzzles your whole body to it's cheek, purring. To you, the purring sounds like a chainsaw revving up, but you are a bit more calm knowing that your not going to become food.

You look up to see a giant, soft belly of the cats in front of you. While you are tempted to go ahead and go on it, you're also worried about staying around with this giant cat for too long. You climb down the couch and down to the floors. You quickly pass by a cat tree, hoping there's no cats there, as you successfully make it to the hallways.

There, you are stuck in a fork. On the left, you see a small bedroom. That could be your safe haven. On the right, you see the kitchen. You could always make an escape to the outside.

info.brief_description: The housecats of a small town are getting hungry...
info.description:
You are an ordinary 21-year old, who's stopping by in a small town on your backpacking throughout the world. However, you find that the housecats in this neighbourhood are acting very strange...

Rules:
Every type of vore is allowed, except for hard vore.
No M/M.
Sex is allowed but try not to make it too graphic.

Enjoy and be sure to add as many chapters as you can!
